description:
## Poster Font - Create outstanding titles

![Screenshot of Poster Font](https://www.japplis.com/poster-font/images/poster-font-screenshot.png)

Create beautiful titles for your professional presentations, your website or your video thumbnails. 
      * Combine amoung more than 100 effects
      * Select from the more than 100 templates
      * Batch processing of multiple text
      * Support for multiple lines text
      
      Freemium with 30 free created text each month then a watermark is applied to the images.
author: Japplis
